reviews.review_msg: Really nice professor to have. He cares about your success in the class and he is always open to questions. Make sure to understand the questions he does in his class and the questions on FlipIt Physics.

Rasoul is one of the most genuine and caring professors ever. Is he a perfect professor, no but he is there to help you reach your goals along every step of the way. One of the best things you can do in his class is contribute and ask questions, which will make his class even more productive.

Rasoul is a really nice prof, however his teaching style isn't for everyone. He's super caring and funny but don't take this as a sign to slack off. His teaching method isn't lecture heavy but depends on you actually doing the work and understanding the material. He does a lot of fun interactive demos. overall a really great prof, one of my fav!
A course with amazing things to be learnt and a very poor method of teaching them. Loved all the information, but this course is bogged down in irrelevant paperwork and poorly planned demonstrations.
The most hilarious physics prof in the entire Uni.
He is an amazing prof. The course in general, is bad, but he does his level best to make it interesting

He is an amazing prof. He cares for his students and goes out of his way to help us if we need it. He explains things very well and if we're confused about a concept, he will always elaborate until we understand. Not only is he a good prof but he's incredibly funny as well. 100% would take his class again, wish he would teach all physic courses
Funny guy, makes lecture not boring. Very approachable and friendly!

Rasoul is an amazing professor, he really cares about his students and is always available to help outside of class. He takes students' opinions into account and tries to bring material into class that we have said we need most help with. Going to his office hours was super helpful and fun as well, he makes the subject interesting.
Rasoul makes the most of a poorly designed course. He is a nice guy and cares about your education.
Rasoul, is one of the nicest prof I ever had. He is always available for help and he gave our class group midterms which really helped boost our marks.

Had rasoul as a lab tech in my phys 101 studio format in surrey, very approachable and helpful during and after class. Never had him as a prof, but would love to take a class with him! Super friendly dude.
